INCLOUDIBLY is a Zurich-based web hosting company that provides high quality Dedicated Server hosting with on-demand DDoS protection.

Why VPS by Incloudibly?

  • 3 YEARS IN BUSINESS WITH THOUSANDS OF SATISFIED CLIENTS [review 1] [review 2] [review 3] [review 4]
  • INSTANT VPS SETUP
  • BACKUP SNAPSHOTS
  • 99.9% UPTIME SLA
  • 10 GB/S PREMIUM NETWORK CONNECTION
  • 1 HOUR SLA SUPPORT
  • DC IN ZURICH, SWITZERLAND
  • SWISS LAWS ON PRIVACY AND DATA PROTECTION
  • UP TO 22% OFF YOUR ORDER
  • PAYPAL, CREDIT CARDS, BITCOIN, LITECOIN & NEXTCOIN ACCEPTED
  • DDOS PROTECTION ON DEMAND
